metadata.title: CVE-2021-47529 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iwlwifi: Fix memory leaks in error handling path Should an error occur(invalid TLV len or memory allocation failure), the memory alreadyallocated in 'reduce_power_data' should be freed before returning,otherwise it is leaking.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
